ygData.subject: Paw of Opolla
ygData.msgSnippet: I have managed to get 2 pieces  the paw and 1 ring ( identified with spell as a Ring
ygData.messageBody:
<!doctype html public "-//w3c//dtd html 4.0 transitional//en">
<html>
I have managed to get 2 pieces  the paw and 1 ring ( identified with
spell as a Ring of Opolla) the paw is a four slot container so I was wondering
if anybody knew of  any Magic rings Lore items Like the Platinum ring
off Gynok Moltar in befallen ( crap stats) .. They may be what i need I'm
currently looking in Erudin and Kerra isle for some .. but haven't found
any yet ...
<p>--
<p>Jamie Macdonald
<p>A.K.A
<br>Magis DarkStone
<br>Mercenary Mage
<br>Erollisi Marr
<p>-----------------------------------------------------------
<p>"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."
<p>"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"
<p>"Two are 10 times more powerful than One"
<br>-----------------------------------------------------------
<br> </html>
